biotools.summary: VASE is a web-tool for visualizing alignments on a protein structure. It allows you to enter the ID of a protein structure in PDB format for which VASE will generate an interface. VASE will show a set of homologous sequences, aligned to the sequence of your structure, along with entropy/variability data and a 3D interface. Here's an example: 1CRN.

bioschemas.name: VASE
